args.name: watched_team_alias
args.question: What team are you interested in? Use the 3 letter alias.

args.name: other_team_alias
args.question: What team are you interested in competitions against? Use the 3 letter alias.

args.name: game_status
args.question: What point of the game are you interested in? Use scheduled, inprogress, halftime or closed.

nba_team.doc: receive updates on all the NBA games of a given team; `gameStatus` can be scheduled, inprogress, halftime or closed
nba_team.confirmation: an NBA game starts, stops or the score changes
examples: monitor nba games of $watched_team_alias
notify me when nba team $watched_team_alias plays
notify me when nba team $watched_team_alias plays against $other_team_alias
notify me when nba team $watched_team_alias plays the game is $game_status

args.name: watched_team_alias
args.question: What team are you interested in? Use the 3 letter alias.

args.name: other_team_alias
args.question: What team are you interested in competitions against? Use the 3 letter alias.

args.name: game_status
args.question: What point of the game are you interested in? Use scheduled, inprogress, halftime or closed.

soccer_eu_team.doc: receive updates on all the soccer games (national league, national cup or Champions League) of a given European team; `gameStatus` can be scheduled, inprogress, halftime or closed
soccer_eu_team.confirmation: an European soccer game starts, stops or the score changes
examples: monitor soccer games of eu team $watched_team_alias
notify me when eu soccer team $watched_team_alias plays
notify me when eu soccer team $watched_team_alias plays against $other_team_alias
notify me when eu soccer team $watched_team_alias plays and the game is $game_status

args.name: watched_team_alias
args.question: What team are you interested in? Use the 3 letter alias.

args.name: other_team_alias
args.question: What team are you interested in competitions against? Use the 3 letter alias.

args.name: game_status
args.question: What point of the game are you interested in? Use scheduled, inprogress, halftime or closed.

soccer_us_team.doc: receive updates on all the soccer games (CONCACAF, MSL, etc) of a given North American team; `gameStatus` can be scheduled, inprogress, halftime or closed
soccer_us_team.confirmation: an American soccer game starts, stops or the score changes
examples: monitor us soccer games of $watched_team_alias
notify me when us soccer team $watched_team_alias plays
notify me when us soccer team $watched_team_alias plays against $other_team_alias
notify me when us soccer team $watched_team_alias plays and the game is $game_status

args.name: tournament_search_term
args.question: What tournament are you interested in?

args.name: game_status
args.question: What point of the game are you interested in? Use scheduled, inprogress, halftime or closed.

soccer_eu_tourney.doc: receive updates on soccer games as with soccer_eu_team, searching by tournament or league name (e.g., 'Champions League')
soccer_eu_tourney.confirmation: an European soccer game starts, stops or the score changes
examples: monitor eu soccer games part of $tournament_search_term

args.name: tournament_search_term
args.question: What tournament are you interested in?

args.name: game_status
args.question: What point of the game are you interested in? Use scheduled, inprogress, halftime or closed.

soccer_us_tourney.doc: receive updates on soccer games as with soccer_eu_team, searching by tournament or league name (e.g., 'Champions League')
soccer_us_tourney.confirmation: an American soccer game starts, stops or the score changes
examples: monitor us soccer games part of $tournament_search_term
